# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. For this exceptional item, I am offering it at a special introductory price of $120. I hope you find this offer appealing and look forward to your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer and proceed to the next round, where you will send Alice a counteroffer 
(3) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
